message:
BitNet-rs v0.1.0 MVP Release

This release establishes the CPU baseline with honest compute verification.

## Key Features

- CPU inference with I2_S quantization (10-20 tok/s for 2B models)
- Receipt verification system (schema v1.0.0)
- Model Gates (CPU) CI enforcement
- Deterministic inference with BITNET_DETERMINISTIC=1

## CPU Baseline

Receipt: docs/baselines/20251015-cpu.json
Performance: 15.3 tok/s (I2_S, 2B model, AVX2)
Kernels: i2s_cpu_quantized_matmul, tl1_lut_dequant_forward, etc.

## Verification

All inference runs generate receipts proving real computation. CI blocks PRs with mocked receipts.

To reproduce:
```bash
export BITNET_DETERMINISTIC=1 RAYON_NUM_THREADS=1 BITNET_SEED=42
cargo run -p xtask -- benchmark --model models/*.gguf --tokens 128
cargo run -p xtask -- verify-receipt ci/inference.json
```

## Breaking Changes

- Default features are now EMPTY (must use --no-default-features --features cpu|gpu)
- Removed mocked inference paths
- Receipt schema v1.0.0 required for all inference

See CHANGELOG.md for full details.
